elements.text: You and your partner have been trying for a baby for the last year. You recently found out that you have HD and have started rethinking the decision to grow your family. The thought of navigating new responsibilities with this diagnosis leaves you feeling...

elements.name: Trying for a Baby_Presymptomatic_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
